column6: • The Merc with a Mind's first solo series comes to a HEAD! • With the life of the woman who's stolen his heart hanging in the balance, the Mental Organism Designed Only for Killing races to put an end to Baron Mordo's murderous bid for power. • Will M.O.D.O.K. save the day? One thing's for sure: He will live up to his design...
column8: | penciller (cover):David Lafuente | artist:Amilcar Pinna | writer:Christopher Yost
